list.name: Default
list.comment: Tested FileReaderRunnables and the server. FileHandling and GeneralThreadPool work like a charm. Still need to test out Comms, ClientsToBeServed and FileWatcher. Will do so next commit. Added a list watcher to GeneralThreadPool. GeneralThreadPool now takes a SequenceConvulsion argument to notify the user of when the ThreadPool has finished computing all its jobs. FileReaderRunnables also sets the FilePool of FileWatcher now since only FileReaderRunnables has a reference to it. Next commit will include tested versions of Comms , ClientsToBeServed etc
